name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: Powerful laptop with M3 Pro chip, 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 18 hours of battery life. Perfect for professionals and creators.

name: Nike Air Max 270 React
description: Comfortable running shoes with React foam cushioning and Max Air unit. Designed for everyday comfort and style with breathable mesh upper.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer 5-Qt
description: Professional-grade stand mixer with 5-quart capacity, 10 speeds, and tilt-head design. Includes wire whip, flat beater, and dough hook attachments.
